mapper.insert: insert into cafepz(unq, userid, nickname, cafename, insta, addr, photopath, title, content ) values (cafepz_seq.nextval, #{userid}, #{nickname}, #{cafename}, #{insta}, #{addr}, #{photopath}, 'S', 'S')
mapper.select: select unq,photopath,userid,insta from cafepz where addr = #{addr} and delete_yn='N'
mapper.update: UPDATE CAFEPZ SET DELETE_YN = 'Y' WHERE UNQ=#{unq}
